meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Mitella, especially M. diphylla, native to North America.
meanings.sent1: The miterworts in the garden have delicate white flowers.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a miterworts plant with heart-shaped leaves on my nature walk.
meanings.sent3: The tiny miterworts seemed to be whispering secrets to the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The miterworts stood out like little stars in the green sea of leaves.
meanings.sent5: The miterworts added a touch of elegance to the forest floor.

meanings.definition: A small, creeping plant with heart-shaped leaves and white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The miterworts peeked out from under the bushes in the park.
meanings.sent2: She carefully planted the miterworts along the edge of the flower bed.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel played hide-and-seek among the miterworts.
meanings.sent4: The miterworts spread like a soft blanket over the ground.
meanings.sent5: The miterworts danced in the gentle breeze, their leaves shimmering.
